Package com.teamboid.twitterapi.client

Provides the main classes for interacting with Twitter, the Twitter interface being the most important.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Twitter
    The main class used within this library, used for performing API actions on Twitter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Authorizer
    Used to authenticate accounts and get logged in instances of Twitter
    HttpParam  
    Paging
    Passes paging information to any API functions that can include page, count, since_id, or max_id parameters.
    Urls
    Contains URL constants for the Twitter API functions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Authorizer.DebugLevel  
    ProfileImageSize
    Used to specify Twitter.getUserProfileImage(String, ProfileImageSize) image sizes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TwitterException
    Represents a TwitterException, wrapping an error message returned from Twitter in JSON formatting.

Package com.teamboid.twitterapi.client Description

Provides the main classes for interacting with Twitter, the Twitter interface being the most important.
